title: Bellevue AJ Style Table Lamp Black
body: This beauty is designed by Arne Jacobsen in 1929 for an exhibition of a House of the Future in Copenhagen. The Bellevue AJ Style Table Lamp channels Arne Jacobsen’s graceful lines and elegant functionalism. The curved arm that resembles a swan’s neck and a beautiful lampshade showcasing a unique asymmetrical shape. The Bellevue AJ Style Table Lamp is Jacobsen’s first lamp design and has been a stunning icon ever since. It’s sleek and avant-grade design will give your house a timeless and retro design.
